key_risks: Environmental and regulatory risks due to PFAS contamination lawsuit and EPA violations
Legal and compliance risks including regulatory costs and labor disputes
Market and operational risks from raw material volatility and economic sensitivity
controversies: Class-action lawsuit over PFAS contamination in Westminster, Mass.
EPA Notices of Violation for breaches of environmental laws
Labor disputes with the United Steelworkers Union and NLRB charges
Employment lawsuit against subsidiary American Flange
environmental_issues: PFAS contamination and associated environmental and health concerns
EPA violations related to Resource Conservation and Recovery Act and Clean Air Act
Sustainability challenges in waste management and recycling practices
social_issues: Labor disputes and allegations of non-compliance with employment laws
Wrongful termination lawsuit involving an employee with a seizure disorder
governance_issues: Corporate governance concerns related to compliance with global sanctions
Restructuring and transition to new reporting segments
